case.title: DADDY/DAUGHTER ROLE PLAY - 45 (SUFFOLK COUNTY)
case.text: IF THIS ROLE PLAY SOUNDS ENTICING TO YOU OR PERHAPS YOU HAVE OTHER IDEA'S AND YOU ARE SUBMISSIVE THEN WRITE BACK TO THIS DOMINANT DADDY AND LETS GET TOGETHER. WE COULD DO DADDY/DAUGHTER, STEP DAUGHTER, NEICE, ETC..WRITE ROLEPLAY IN THE SUBJECT SO I KNOW ITS NOT SPAM AND BE AT LEAST 18..NO GAMES, SPAMMERS, OR ENDLESS EMAILS. I COULD HOST IN SUFFOLK BUT MUST SEND A PIC IN FIRST EMAIL FOR A RESPONSE BACK.
